name.baseName: Production stage ; crude oil ; logging, drilling and oil production engineering
开采阶段;原油;测井、钻井采油工程

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This enterprise is the largest Daqing crude oil processing base in China.
该企业是全国最大的大 庆原油加工基地。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Logging refers to the process of measuring, analyzing and recording the physical properties of rocks and formations in Wells by using logging instruments during or after drilling, so as to obtain the properties of underground rocks and reservoir characteristics.Logging technology includes the selection and use of logging instruments, the acquisition and analysis of logging data, and the interpretation of logging curves. The commonly used logging methods include electric logging, acoustic logging, nuclear magnetic resonance logging and so on. Drilling technology involves the selection and operation of drilling equipment, the design and use of drill bit and drill pipe, and the circulation and management of drilling fluid. Common drilling methods include rotary drilling, circulation drilling and non-circulation drilling. Oil engineering involves the design, construction and management of oil Wells, the selection and operation of oil production equipment, and the maintenance and control of reservoir pressure. Common oil recovery technologies include natural oil production, artificial lifting, water flooding, gas flooding, polymer flooding and so on.

测井是指利用测井仪器在钻井过程中或钻井完成后对井内岩石、地层等进行物理性质的测量、分析和记录，以获取地下岩石的性质和储层特征的过程。测井技术包括测井仪器的选择和使用、测井数据的获取和分析、测井曲线的解释等。常用的测井方法包括电测井、声波测井、核磁共振测井等。钻井技术涉及钻井设备的选择和操作、钻头和钻杆的设计和使用、钻井液的循环和管理等方面。常见的钻井方式包括旋挖钻井、循环钻井和非循环钻井等。油工程涉及油井的设计、建设和管理、采油设备的选择和操作、油藏压力的维护和调控等方面。常见的采油技术包括自然产油、人工提升、水驱、气驱、聚合物驱等。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This industrial process pertains to the extraction stage of crude oil involving well logging, drilling, and oil production engineering. The crude oil extracted from this process at the largest Daqing crude oil processing base in China is intended for refining and subsequent use as a feedstock for producing various petrochemicals, fuels, and as a raw material for energy generation and industrial applications.
该工业过程涉及原油的开采阶段，包括测井、钻井及采油工程。从中国最大的大庆原油加工基地提取的原油，旨在用于精炼以及作为生产各种石化产品、燃料的基础原料，也作为能源生产和工业应用的原料。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 吴明,姜国强,贾冯睿等.基于物质流和生命周期分析的石油行业碳排放[J].资源科学,2018,40(06):1287-1296.
吴明,姜国强,贾冯睿等.基于物质流和生命周期分析的石油行业碳排放[J].资源科学,2018,40(06):1287-1296.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, users must consider the technological specificity of the extraction process which includes well logging, drilling, and oil production engineering. Attention should be given to the environmental impact of these activities, including energy use, emissions, and potential ecosystems disturbances. It's important to integrate this data accurately within the broader LCA model, ensuring alignment with the goal and scope of the assessment, especially focusing on the upstream extraction impacts. Any recycling or end-of-life aspects concerning the crude oil should be examined in the context of their subsequent processing and usage phases.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户必须考虑包括测井、钻井和采油工程在内的开采过程的技术特性。应重点关注这些活动的环境影响，包括能源使用、排放以及潜在的生态系统干扰。在更广泛的LCA模型中准确集成此数据非常重要，确保与评估的目标和范围保持一致，特别是关注上游开采影响。关于原油的任何回收或产品寿命末期方面的考虑应在其后续处理和使用阶段的背景下检查。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The total amount of carbon input in oil at the input end. 85% of which comes from Daqing Oilfield, accounting for14% of oil production in 2015. The enterprise is the largest Daqing crude oil processing base in the country.
输入端石油中碳输入总量。其中85%来源于大庆油田，占大庆油田 2015 年石油产量的 14%。该企业是全国最大的大庆原油加工基地。
